translation.es: Manejo muy mal. Hola. Soy Tracy.

translation.en: - Let me help you. - Okay. Oh, thanks.
No, Mom, she's not here yet.
At least I got to pick my side of the room though.
translation.es: Al menos pude escoger mi lado del cuarto.

translation.en: All right, I'll talk to you later. I love you. Bye.
translation.es: Luego te llamo. Te quiero. Adiós.

translation.en: Hey. Tau Sigma Kappa's throwing a bash. You have to come.
translation.es: Hay una fiesta de Tau Sigma Kappa. Tienes que ir.

translation.en: - I'm sorry, Tau-- ? - They're a frat. You know, beer, guys....
You know, I think I'm gonna wait for my roommate.
translation.es: Voy a esperar a mi compañera de cuarto.

translation.en: Come on! It's gonna be fun.
Me and Kim are coming. Please, please, please.
translation.es: Kim y yo vamos a ir. Por favor.

translation.en: Did you see that guy? He's checking you out.
translation.es: ¿Viste a ese chico? ¡No deja de mirarte!

translation.en: Thank you. We're gonna take a break. Someone get us a beer!
translation.es: Vamos a tomar un descanso, ¡y una cerveza!

translation.en: I'm gonna get some more punch. You guys want some?
Oh, no. I am so sorry about that.
Let's find you a seat and I'll grab you a towel.
translation.es: Vamos a buscarte una silla y voy por una toalla.

translation.en: - Here. Here you go. - Thank you.
I'm gonna grab a beer. Do you want one?
Oh, no, thanks. I'm just having punch.
translation.es: No, gracias. Solo estoy tomando ponche.

translation.en: That might explain a few things.
We tend to spike the punch.
- Nice. - When a girl has had three cups....
translation.es: -Qué bien. -Cuando una chica toma tres vasos...

translation.en: If we don't get her up into a room...
translation.es: Si no la llevamos a un cuarto...

translation.en: ...we have to pull kitchen duty for, like, a week.
translation.es: ...nos toca limpiar la cocina una semana.

translation.en: I'm gonna go to the bathroom. I have to clean this up.
translation.es: Voy al baño. Tengo que limpiarme esto.

translation.en: Plan didn't work. I guess it backfired.
translation.es: No salió mi plan. Me salió el tiro por la culata.

translation.en: I purposely spilled beer on you to start a conversation.
translation.es: Te eché la cerveza encima para conocerte.

translation.en: - You purposely spilled beer on me? - Yes, I did.
Sara! Sara! I think you better come here.
- Is she a friend of yours? - Yes.
Take it off! Take it off! Take it off!
- Yeah! - I got her, I got her...
...I got her. Get off of her. Get off her!
- Yeah, who's got you? - I guess that would be me.
translation.es: -¿A ti quién te lleva? -Supongo que yo.

translation.en: - Oh, God! Oh, God! - Okay, here we go.
- All I had was punch. - Here we go.
- You got her? - Thanks, Sara. Okay.
Hey, you're that cute drummer guy from that shitty band.
translation.es: Tú eres el baterista guapo de ese conjunto malo.

translation.en: You know, I'm gonna get yelled at for helping girls actually leave a frat party.
translation.es: Me van a gritar por ayudarle a unas chicas a irse de la fiesta.

translation.en: It's kind of like the opposite of everything we stand for.
translation.es: Va en contra de nuestros principios.

translation.en: - Wait. - No, keep it. Save it till next time.

translation.es: Lamento que tengas que limpiar la cocina.

translation.en: - Who are you? - I'm your roommate, Rebecca.

translation.es: Ten, tómate estas. Te van a ayudar.

translation.en: I didn't throw up on you, did I?
Come on. Let's hit the bookstore. The walk will help your head.
translation.es: Ven. Vamos a la librería. Te ayudará caminar.

translation.en: I just wanted to hear your voice.
translation.es: Nada más quería oír tu voz.

translation.en: - I told you not to do this. - I need to talk to you.
translation.es: -Te dije que no me llamaras. -Necesito hablar contigo.

translation.en: Sara, listen, I wanna come out there.
Yeah, but you didn't, remember? That's the problem.
translation.es: Sí, pero no viniste. Ese es el problema.

translation.en: We were supposed to go to college together.
translation.es: Íbamos a ir juntos a la universidad.

translation.en: We both applied to Brown, and I got in but he didn't.
translation.es: Solicitamos en Brown. Yo entré pero él no.

translation.en: And I stuck to our agreement. And we both committed to ULA.
translation.es: Yo cumplí con el acuerdo. Los dos quedamos en venir aquí.

translation.en: And a couple of weeks ago, a spot opens up at Brown, and--
translation.es: Y hace dos semanas se abrió una plaza en Brown y...

translation.en: - Do you miss him? - Sometimes I think I do.
It's hard to let go. Believe me, I know.
translation.es: Es difícil romper. Créeme, lo sé.

translation.en: But you're in college now. A girl's gotta move on.
translation.es: Pero ya estás en la universidad. Hay que pasar a lo que sigue.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm kind of a clotheshorse.
Actually, can I put some stuff on your side?
- No problem. - You can borrow anything you want.
translation.es: -No hay problema. -Puedes usar lo que quieras.

translation.en: - Some of this I've only seen in Vogue. - My parents' idea of bonding...
translation.es: -Tienes cosas que veo en Vogue. -Para mis papás, amor...

translation.en: ...is setting me loose with a platinum card.
translation.es: ...es mandarme de compras a Beverly Hills.

translation.en: - You're from here? - Twenty minutes away.
That must be nice. Go home on the weekends, free laundry, free meals.
translation.es: Qué lindo. Pasas ahí el fin de semana, lavandería y comidas gratis.

translation.en: Let's just say nothing is free in my house.
translation.es: Digamos que en mi casa nada es gratis.

translation.en: Oh, it's nothing. It's just some ideas.
Do you mind if I take a look at what you were doing?
It's nothing personal. It's just my process.
translation.es: No tengo nada contra ti. Es que así trabajo.

translation.en: I wouldn't want you to look unless it was perfect.
translation.es: No quiero que lo veas si no es perfecto.

translation.en: Tracy and Kim, this is my roommate, Rebecca.
translation.es: Tracy y Kim, les presento a mi compañera de cuarto, Rebecca.

translation.en: Rebecca. How formal. What can we call you?
translation.es: Rebecca. Qué formal. ¿Cómo te podemos llamar?

translation.en: - How about Reba? - How about Becca?
Well, I gotta go, guys. Bye.
Why should I turn off my BlackBerry to listen to this guy?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tengo que apagar mi BlackBerry para oír a este tipo?.

translation.en: ...will make you understand that you're aspiring to do something great.
translation.es: ...los hará entender que Uds. aspiran a hacer algo maravilloso.

translation.en: To emulate the likes of Marc Jacobs...
translation.es: Emular a gente como Marc Jacobs...

translation.en: What you create will be considered art...
...and don't let anyone tell you differently.
translation.es: ...y que nadie les diga lo contrario.

translation.en: The journey starts right here, right now.
translation.es: El viaje empieza aquí y ahora.

translation.en: ...to make you understand that each of you...
translation.es: ...hacerles entender que cada uno de ustedes...

translation.en: I'm really sorry to bother you. It's just, I must take this class.
translation.es: Siento mucho molestarlo pero tengo que tomar esta clase.
Lo siento, la clase está llena.

translation.en: Late girl, right? What's your name?
translation.es: ¿Tú eres la que llegó tarde? ¿Cómo te llamas?

translation.en: Sara Matthews. I brought a request form.
And why should I sign your form, Sara, when I've turned down a dozen others?
translation.es: ¿Por qué habría de firmar la tuya si he rechazado una docena?

translation.en: Don't worry. Intro Design has three other sections.
translation.es: Tranquila, hay otras clases de diseño.

translation.en: That's okay. I'll take it next year.
translation.es: Está bien. La tomaré el año que viene.

translation.en: I wanna take your class. Thank you.
You happen to have two things I can't teach...
translation.es: Tienes dos cosas que yo no puedo enseñar.

translation.en: - Don't be late. - I will not be late.
translation.es: -No llegues tarde. -No voy a llegar tarde.

translation.en: My friend Irene. She graduated from The Art Institute out here last year.
translation.es: Mi amiga Irene. Se graduó del Instituto de Arte el año pasado.

translation.en: She used to be a design consultant for Marc Jacobs.
translation.es: Era asesora de diseño de Marc Jacobs.

translation.en: Milan in the fall. And now she's off to Barcelona.
translation.es: Milán en otoño. Y ahora va a Barcelona.

translation.en: Hey. You guys free? We're going to Seven Grand.
- How are we gonna get in? - We're hot.
From the two gentlemen at the end of the bar.
- Let's dance. Yeah. - Can I put these in your bag?
translation.es: -Vamos a bailar. -¿Puedo meter esto en tu bolsa?

translation.en: - Watch this guy hit on me. - Yeah.
- How you doing? - Good. What's your name?
Tracy. I was watching you from across the bar.
translation.es: Te estaba observando del otro lado del bar.

translation.en: Would you accept a collect call from Sara Matthews?
- So where's Tracy? - I have no idea.
Well, as long as I'm here....
I can't believe she ran out on you.
translation.es: No puedo creer que te haya dejado así.

translation.en: - Thank you for coming. - Of course. I was up.
You know, tonight Tracy had her shot. Tomorrow you're all mine.
translation.es: Hoy le tocó a Tracy. Mañana eres completamente mía.

translation.en: I wanna show you the big city the right way.
And I promise I won't abandon you.
translation.es: ...y te prometo que no te abandonaré.

translation.en: They're a little wilder than the older stuff.
translation.es: Son un poco más atrevidas que las más viejas.

translation.en: Come on, I wanna show you something.
I love how he captures her personality through her eyes.
translation.es: Me encanta como capta su personalidad en los ojos.

translation.en: It's like she really wants to help you.
translation.es: Como que realmente te quiere ayudar.

translation.en: I'm so glad you liked it.
- It's not everyone's taste, you know? - Yeah.
What, you don't have graffiti in Des Moines?
Well, yeah. Lana loves Kevin, Stacy loves Robert.
translation.es: Sí. Lana ama a Kevin, Stacy ama a Robert...

translation.en: Oh, now that is one art form I don't get.
translation.es: Ese tipo de arte no lo entiendo.

translation.en: Needles in skin. No, thank you.
translation.es: Agujas en la piel. No, gracias.

translation.en: - No, you don't. - Yeah, I do.
It's my older sister. She died when I was 9.
translation.es: Es mi hermana mayor. Murió cuando yo tenía 9 años.

translation.en: It's okay. This keeps her with me.
translation.es: Está bien. Así siempre está conmigo.
Yo siempre quise tener una hermana.

translation.en: Guess who I'm adding as my new favorite artist.
translation.es: Adivina quién va a ser mi artista favorito.

translation.en: The Devil Wears Prada is your favorite movie?
translation.es: ¿Te encanta El Diablo Viste a la Moda?

translation.en: Nothing. It's just not a classic is all.
translation.es: Por nada. No es una película clásica.

translation.en: But it is about a small- town girl making it in the fashion world.
translation.es: Pero es de una chica de pueblo que triunfa en la moda.
Pensé que te iba a gustar.

translation.en: I know, I know, I know.
I probably broke about 40 different dorm rules...
...and I should just take it to a shelter, but I just can't.
translation.es: ...y debería llevarlo a un albergue, pero no puedo.

translation.en: Well, I kind of already named her. Cuddles.
translation.es: Ya le puse un nombre. Cuddles.

translation.en: I was just trying it on.
You can borrow anything of mine except for this.
translation.es: Puedes tomar lo que sea, menos esto.

translation.en: It's the only thing I kept of hers.
translation.es: Es lo único que conservo de ella.

translation.en: You're the first roommate I've had since she died...
translation.es: No había compartido un cuarto desde que murió...

translation.en: In a good way or a bad way?
- You wanted a mocha smoothie, right? - Yeah.
translation.es: Tú pediste un licuado de moca, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Now, there appears to be a pattern forming here.
translation.es: Parece que se está estableciendo un patrón.
Un beso no significa que te puedes colar.

translation.en: - ...doesn't mean I'll let you cut in line. - Then what does it mean?
translation.es: Un beso no significa que te puedes colar. ¿Qué significa?

translation.en: Okay, so tonight, the men of Tau Sigma Kappa...
translation.es: Esta noche los hombres de Tau Sigma Kappa...

translation.en: A frat party? I don't know.
Thank God. You're going to be my excuse not to go.
translation.es: Gracias a Dios. Tú vas a ser mi excusa para no ir.

translation.en: - Am I gonna get my mocha? - Yes.
Can you get him a mocha, please? Thank you.
translation.es: ¿Le puedes dar uno de moca? Gracias.

translation.en: - All right. Yes. - So I will see you tonight. - Okay. - Yes, you will. All right.
translation.es: -Nos vemos esta noche. -Sí, nos vemos. Muy bien.
¿Vas a ir a Sigma Kappa hoy?

translation.en: - Kim and I are going. - Why, so you can ditch me again?
translation.es: -Kim y yo vamos a ir. -¿Para que me vuelvas a dejar?

translation.en: Sara, the guy had a Porsche and a hot tub.
translation.es: El tipo tenía un Porsche y un jacuzzi.

translation.en: What I meant to say is I'm sorry. I totally screwed up.
translation.es: Lo que quise decir es, perdón. Metí la pata.

translation.en: Richard Prince is having a showing tonight.
translation.es: Hoy hay una exposición de Richard Prince.

translation.en: I bought two tickets, since he's your favorite artist.
translation.es: Compré dos boletos porque es tu artista favorito.

translation.en: I-- I actually have a date.
- I can reschedule. - You don't have to.
I want to. Under one condition.
Who cares? What are you, a label whore?
translation.es: ¿Qué importa? ¿Te dejas llevar por la marca?

translation.en: I got it at a flea market for 20 bucks. It's vintage.
translation.es: La compré en un mercado de pulgas por 20 dólares.

translation.en: I am jumping in the shower and then we'll go.
translation.es: Me voy a dar una ducha y nos vamos.

translation.en: - I gotta go that way. - Okay.
- I'll see you later. Have a good day. - Bye.
translation.es: -Nos vemos. Que tengas un buen día. -Adiós.

translation.en: Listen, something is up with your roommate.
translation.es: Tu compañera de cuarto tiene algo raro.

translation.en: She was outside my room this morning.
translation.es: Estaba afuera de mi cuarto hoy.

translation.en: I opened my door and there she was, sitting there staring like some psycho.
translation.es: Estaba ahí sentada, mirándome fijamente como una sicótica.

translation.en: You ask her. I'm staying away from her.
translation.es: Pregúntale a ella. No me le voy a acercar.
A diferencia de la opinión popular...

translation.en: ...beauty is not in the eye of the beholder.
translation.es: ...la belleza no está en los ojos del que mira.

translation.en: It's in the hands of the designer.
translation.es: Está en las manos del diseñador.

translation.en: Now, tell me, looking at these two options, which one's best?
translation.es: Viendo estas dos opciones, ¿cuál es mejor?

translation.en: Is there a right or wrong in fashion?
Who can tell me the difference between fashion...
translation.es: ¿Cuál es la diferencia entre moda y estilo?
5 y Spring. ven ahora mismo. ¿Srta. Matthews?

translation.en: Fashions fade, but style is eternal.
translation.es: La moda desaparece, el estilo es eterno.

translation.en: All the money in the world can't buy you style.
translation.es: Ni con todo el dinero del mundo compras el estilo.

translation.en: But it can buy you a good stylist.
translation.es: Pero si compras un buen estilista.

translation.en: How'd you know what time my class...
Tracy said something about you scared her.
translation.es: Me dijo Tracy que la asustaste.

translation.en: No. It's more like she scared me.
translation.es: No. Más bien ella me asustó a mí.

translation.en: She was racing to the bathroom like she was gonna hurl.
translation.es: Iba corriendo al baño como que iba a vomitar.

translation.en: Well, the girl does love to party.
Anyway, I wouldn't worry about it.
I gotta go meet Irene. Thanks again for the coffee.
translation.es: Tengo que ir con Irene. Gracias por el café.

translation.en: I so wanna be you when I grow up.
translation.es: Quiero ser como tú cuando crezca.

translation.en: - Hell, I wanna be me when I grow up. - Irene. Ready?
translation.es: -Yo quiero ser como yo cuando crezca. -¿Lista?

translation.en: Two seconds. Your dad keeps leaving me messages. Like, four this week.
translation.es: En dos segundos. Tu papá ya me dejó cuatro mensajes esta semana.

translation.en: I hope you told him I'm closing the library every night.
translation.es: ¿Le dijiste que me encierro en la biblioteca?

translation.en: I told him I haven't seen you. For all I know, you could be a crack ho.
translation.es: Que no te he visto. Podrías ser una prostituta drogadicta.

translation.en: - Thank you for coming. - Of course. I wouldn't miss it.
translation.es: -¡Gracias por venir! -No me lo iba a perder.

translation.en: I haven't seen you around much.
translation.es: Casi no te veo por aquí.

translation.en: Since you blew me off for dinner and all.
translation.es: Y como me dejaste plantado con la cena y eso...

translation.en: Actually, I was thinking maybe dinner tonight?
translation.es: De hecho, estaba pensando en que fuéramos a cenar hoy.

translation.en: All right. All right. Let's go.
Hey! How about turning on the light?
You wanna know what I think?
I think you're a trashy, little party- going whore.
translation.es: Creo que eres una puta parrandera corriente.

translation.en: And you are a bad influence on her.
translation.es: Y eres una mala influencia para ella.

translation.en: You tell anyone about this and I will kill you.
translation.es: Si le mencionas esto a alguien, te mato.
Está bien. -Está bien. -Qué bonito arete de ombligo.

translation.en: Hey, it's Sara. Leave a message.
Well, thank you for helping me not study.
translation.es: Gracias por ayudarme a no estudiar.

translation.en: I kept on calling and calling.
- Rebecca, this is Stephen. - I'm going to bed now.
translation.es: -Rebecca, él es Stephen. -Me voy a acostar.
Me alegro de que estés bien.

translation.en: I guess she's right. I should have called.
Last night, I was just worried about you.
You don't need to worry about me. I can take care of myself. Okay?
translation.es: No necesitas preocuparte por mí. Yo me puedo cuidar sola.

translation.en: - We're good, right? - Yeah, we're good.
- I'm already her best friend? - It's kind of sad.
translation.es: -¿Ya soy su mejor amiga? -Es medio triste.
A lo mejor le gustas de verdad.

translation.en: - You know what I mean? - No, I don't.
- I think you do. - You are a moron.
- Hey. - I heard you changed dorms.
translation.es: Oí que te cambiaste de dormitorio.

translation.en: Yeah. Conrad Hall, it seemed like a better vibe, so....
translation.es: Sí. Conrad parece tener mejor ambiente.

translation.en: - We should get together. Grab a bite. - Sara.
I don't know. She just walked off.
translation.es: No sé. Se dio la vuelta y se fue.

translation.en: Well, she's always been a flake.
- It's not a great view. - No, it's not. It's all right.
translation.es: -No es muy buena vista. -No. No es la gran cosa.

translation.en: It's all right. Yeah. It's about a six out of 10.
translation.es: No está mal. Yo le daría un seis de 10 .

translation.en: - I give it a four. - A four?
That's quite critical of a view.
Should we-- ? Should we go home?

translation.es: ¿A mi casa o a la tuya?

translation.en: - Okay. - Yes, and I'll make you a bet.
translation.es: Sí, y te voy a hacer una apuesta.

translation.en: A, we go to your place.

translation.es: ...con mi camita y mi compañera de cuarto.

translation.en: This is kind of a stupid bet.
Apparently, I'm kind of a stupid guy.
- So.... - So we go to your place.
- You're kidding me. - No, I'm not.
I'm just gonna have to start taking my clothes off out here.
translation.es: Me voy a empezar a quitar la ropa aquí afuera.

translation.en: - Oops, there goes my shirt. - I don't believe you.
- There go my jeans. - Damn it, that is my striptease. Stop it.
translation.es: -¡Ahí van mis pantalones! -¡Ese striptease es mío! ¡Ya para!

translation.en: You know, I'm just gonna make you strip all over again.
translation.es: Voy a hacer que te vuelvas a desvestir.
No me vuelvas a llamar jamás.

translation.en: - Don't ever call me again. - Wait, Sara, what do you mean? I--
translation.es: -No me vuelvas a llamar jamás. -¿Qué quieres decir?

translation.en: Sorry I didn't call. I left my phone.
translation.es: Perdón por no llamarte. Dejé mi teléfono.

translation.en: Do you wanna get some breakfast? Oh, no.
And if you keep her, I lose my job.
translation.es: Y si te quedas con ella yo pierdo mi empleo.

translation.en: - Do we understand each other? - Yes.
Hey. Come in. What took you so long?
- You didn't. - I did. Cabs are too expensive.
translation.es: -No es cierto. -Sí. Los taxis son muy caros.

translation.en: Sara, you can't just go walking around downtown in L.A. by yourself.
translation.es: No puedes caminar sola en el centro de Los Ángeles.

translation.en: - This is not Des Moines. - I know.
translation.es: -No estamos en Des Moines. -Ya lo sé.

translation.en: The city is full of crazies.
translation.es: Esta ciudad está llena de locos.

translation.en: Let me make us one drink and then we'll go.
translation.es: Vamos a tomar una copa y nos vamos.

translation.en: Yeah, that's a great idea. Hang on.
- Hey, Irene, do you like cats? - Yeah. Why?
- We need to get rid of one. - I travel too much.
- The thing would starve to death. - You're right. No, she can't.
translation.es: -Se moriría de hambre. -Tienes razón. No puede.

translation.en: I'll be home when I'm home.
translation.es: No sé a qué hora regrese.

translation.en: - Bye. It's all right. - Who was that?
translation.es: Adiós. Disculpa. -¿Quién era? -Mi compañera de cuarto.

translation.en: My roommate. She can be overprotective. That sounds fun.
- So where is it? - Where's what?
- You said you had a surprise for me? - Oh, yeah.
translation.es: ¿No me tenías una sorpresa? Ah, sí.

translation.en: So I was cleaning out my closet...
...and I have not worn any of this in the last six months.
translation.es: ...y no he usado nada de esto en meses.

translation.en: - You're kidding me. All of this? - There's more.
We don't have a lot of closet space...
translation.es: No tenemos lugar en el clóset.

translation.en: ...and Rebecca's already taking half my side.
translation.es: Rebecca ocupó la mitad de mi lado.

translation.en: ...why not? This place is huge. I'm never home.
Ditch that roommate of yours and live here.
translation.es: Mándala a volar y múdate aquí.

translation.en: - I'll talk to her about it. - Good.

translation.es: A Irene le gustan mucho las mujeres.

translation.en: It's too bad she couldn't take Cuddles, huh?
translation.es: Lástima que no se quedó con Cuddles.

translation.en: That might not be a problem.
She suggested I move in with her.
translation.es: Me invitó a vivir con ella.

translation.en: I love living here with you.
I'd still technically be living here, so you wouldn't need another roommate.
translation.es: Técnicamente yo seguiría siendo tu compañera de cuarto.

translation.en: It's not like you couldn't use the extra closet space.
translation.es: Y tendrías más espacio en el armario.

translation.en: I don't want more space, I want....
It's just something to think about.
Plus, we'd be able to keep Cuddles.
Yeah, well, I was thinking maybe I'd stay here for Thanksgiving...
translation.es: Pensaba quedarme aquí el Día de Gracias...

translation.en: You know what, Mom? I'm really swamped right now.
Could I call you guys back? Okay. Bye.
translation.es: ¿Les puedo llamar más tarde? Bueno, adiós.

translation.en: Feel how nice and warm it is in there?
I took her with me to do laundry and she was in the basket...
translation.es: La llevé a lavar ropa, iba en la canasta...

translation.en: ...and she ran off. And I went after her but....
translation.es: ...y se escapó y la perseguí pero...

translation.en: Maybe it's karma. We weren't allowed to keep her anyway.
translation.es: A lo mejor es karma. Estaba prohibido tenerla.

translation.en: - It's all my fault. - It was an accident.
It's just stress after stress, you know?
My parents really want me to come home for Thanksgiving.
translation.es: Mis papás quieren que vuelva para el Día de Gracias.

translation.en: Emily died two days before Thanksgiving.
translation.es: Emily murió dos días antes del Día de Gracias.

translation.en: It hasn't always been the most festive holiday in the Matthews household.
translation.es: No es un día alegre en la casa de los Matthews.

translation.en: I know I should be there, but, I don't know...
...it's like there's a ghost at the table, you know?
translation.es: ...es como que hay un fantasma en la mesa.
Pasar el Día de Gracias en mi casa.
-¿No les importaría a tus papás? -Por favor.

translation.en: Stephen also asked me to stay...
translation.es: Stephen también me invitó a quedarme... ...pero gracias.
Los diseños del semestre son para el viernes.

translation.en: Who is the founder of our industry?
translation.es: ¿Quién es el fundador de nuestra industria?

translation.en: Eve. When she handed Adam the fig leaf.
translation.es: Eva. Cuando le dio a Adán la hoja de parra.

translation.en: - Can I see you in my office? - Sure.
I love the danger in your work. It's kinky and edgy.
translation.es: Me encanta la osadía de tus diseños. Son originales y atrevidos...

translation.en: I love the fact that there's all these, like, dark recesses in this...
...innocent exterior. The juxtaposition is awesome. That's great.
translation.es: ...hay cosas obscuras. El contraste es increíble.

translation.en: - Thank you. - And I mean, styles, you know--
They change so rapidly in the fashion world.
translation.es: ...cambian rápidamente en el mundo de la moda.

translation.en: Because you got your particular cut, your technique, you know, the--
translation.es: Tú tienes tu corte particular, tu técnica.

translation.en: Which is what makes it so amazing and exciting.
translation.es: Por eso es tan increíble y excitante.

translation.en: Exactly. Which is why I go to fashion week every year in Paris.
translation.es: Sí. Por eso todos los años voy a la semana de la moda en París.

translation.en: To catch up on what's fresh and amazing and.... What else?
translation.es: Para estar al tanto de lo que es fresco y... ¿qué más?

translation.en: - And, let's face it, to go to the parties. - Sure.
The budget allows for me to bring an assistant every year.
translation.es: El presupuesto me permite llevar un asistente.

translation.en: Usually it's a senior, but not always.
translation.es: Normalmente de último año, pero no siempre.

translation.en: There's a lot of talent in this class...
translation.es: Hay mucho talento en esta clase...

translation.en: ...but the best designers push the boundaries on what's acceptable.
translation.es: ...pero los mejores diseñadores rebasan los límites de lo aceptable.
La oferta sigue en pie, Sara.

translation.en: - What's wrong? - My design professor just kissed me.
translation.es: -¿Qué te pasa? -Mi profesor de diseño me besó.

translation.en: - Are you all right? - And I think the asshole's married.
translation.es: -¿Estás bien? -Y creo que el cabrón es casado.

translation.en: - Are you gonna tell Stephen? - No, that'll just cause problems.
translation.es: -¿Le vas a decir a Stephen? -No. Solo va a causar problemas.

translation.en: - I know. - Thank you for telling me.

translation.es: Me alegro de que siga aquí.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I was just leaving.
- You're not a student of mine. - No, not yet.
translation.es: -Tú no eres mi alumna. -No. Todavía no.

translation.en: - I'm failing Intro Psych. - Yeah, and why is that?
Well, I'm real sorry about that, but I don't know what I can do to help.
translation.es: Lo siento. No sé cómo te puedo ayudar.

translation.en: Tomorrow is the last day to drop a course.
translation.es: Mañana es el último día para salirse de las clases.

translation.en: If I don't add another one in its place, then I'll fall way behind in credits.
translation.es: Si no me inscribo en otra me van a faltar créditos.

translation.en: Daddy won't take that very well.
translation.es: A mi papi no le va a gustar.

translation.en: He might even pull the plug...
translation.es: Es capaz de dejar de pagar...

translation.en: ...which means I'm pretty much at your mercy.
translation.es: ...o sea que estoy en sus manos.

translation.en: It's not my policy to take on students in the middle of the term.
translation.es: Es contra mi política aceptar alumnos a la mitad del semestre.

translation.en: Do I look like just any student to you?
- Oh, your wife's very pretty. - Oh, it's my ex- wife.
translation.es: -Su esposa es muy bonita. -Es mi ex esposa.

translation.en: I might have to ask you a few questions first.
translation.es: Quizá tenga que hacerte unas preguntas.

translation.en: - Ask me anything. - You have design experience?
- None. - What do you know about clothes?
I look better out of them than in them.
translation.es: Que me veo mejor sin ella que con ella.

translation.en: Well, I think we can work something out.
translation.es: Creo que podemos llegar a un acuerdo.

translation.en: - Just tell me and I'll do anything. - Kiss me.
Get off of me! Stop it! Stop!
- Shut up! Quiet! - Get off of me! Stop! Leave me alone!
- You're hurting me! - Quiet. Shut up, would you?
- No! I said no! - Shut up, you little bitch tease!
- Quiet! Quiet! - Get off of me! No! I said no!
- Just tell me and I'll do anything. - Kiss me.
- Professor Roberts, you're hurting me. - Give me that!
You don't have to do this. You don't have to do this.
What do you want? Okay, come on.
- I'll pay for it. All right, I'll pay for that. - Yes, you will.
translation.es: -Te pago si me la das. Te la pago. -Sí, la va a pagar.

translation.en: Just take your seats, please. Welcome.
I'm Professor Jacobs and I'll be taking over the class...

translation.es: ...me voy a encargar de esta clase.

translation.en: They're calling it a leave of absence, but I heard...
translation.es: Dicen que pidió permiso de ausentarse, pero oí otra cosa

translation.en: ...someone sent the dean a recording of him hitting on a student.
translation.es: El rector recibió una grabación anónima comprometiéndolo.

translation.en: - Oh, my God. - Yeah, I know.
Well, that's what you call instant karma.
Okay, I have made a decision.
- You ready? - Yeah, let's hear it.
- I'm gonna quit the band. - What? Why?
translation.es: -Me voy a retirar del conjunto. -¿Por qué?

translation.en: It's a huge waste of time and we suck.
translation.es: Es mucha pérdida de tiempo y somos terribles.

translation.en: I disagree, but why would you say that?
translation.es: No es cierto pero, ¿por qué lo dices?

translation.en: All right, let me think about this.
The only places that we can get booked...
translation.es: Los únicos lugares que nos contratan...

translation.en: ...are my frat house and my girlfriend's coffee shop.
translation.es: ...son mi fraternidad y donde trabaja mi novia.

translation.en: - Did you just say my girlfriend? - Oh, you heard me.
So do you think it'd be fun to stay here for Thanksgiving?
translation.es: ¿Será divertido quedarse aquí para el Día de Gracias?

translation.en: Yeah, you know, you got dinner at the frat house, football games...
translation.es: Sí, ya sabes, cena en la fraternidad, fútbol americano...

translation.en: - That sounds like a blast. It's fun times. - Oh, yeah. It's very good.
A little awkward at times, but....
translation.es: A veces es un poco incómodo pero...

translation.en: Rebecca. Oh, my God. What happened?
- What happened? - I was looking for Cuddles.
- A man pulled me into an alley. And he-- - Okay.
translation.es: -Un hombre me jaló a un callejón. Y... -Está bien.
No es profunda, gracias a Dios.

translation.en: - And then the police. - No, I can't.
You're calling or I am. There is a psycho walking around.
translation.es: Entonces yo la llamo. Hay un sicótico merodeando.

translation.en: - Please, I didn't even see him. - It doesn't matter.
translation.es: -¡Por favor, ni siquiera lo vi! -No importa.

translation.en: You still need to talk to the police. Please. I only want you to know.
translation.es: -Habla con la policía. -Quiero que solo tú sepas.
¡No le digas a nadie, por favor!
Bueno, no les voy a decir.

translation.en: - Just let me help you. - Are you mad at me?
Why would I be mad at you?
Sorry again about not staying, but Rebecca....
translation.es: Perdón por no quedarme, pero Rebecca...

translation.en: No, I get it. I get it.
I'm just gonna make out with my pillow and pretend it's you anyway, so....
translation.es: Voy a besar mi cojín y fingir que eres tú, así que...

translation.en: Just say you're gonna miss me.
translation.es: Di que me vas a extrañar.
Yo también te voy a extrañar.

translation.en: You know, I haven't heard from Jason in weeks.
translation.es: Hace semanas que no tengo noticias de Jason.

translation.en: It's weird how he stopped calling.
translation.es: Es raro cómo dejó de llamar.

translation.en: This is my parents' house. It was never a home when I lived here.
translation.es: Es la casa de mis papás. Nunca fue mi casa.

translation.en: - Oh, my God. What happened? - Mom, stop. Nothing.
- What do you mean? It's not nothing. - Leave it alone.
translation.es: -¿Cómo que nada? Eso no es nada. -Déjalo en paz.

translation.en: We didn't think you'd make it.
translation.es: No pensábamos que fueras a venir.

translation.en: - Sara's my roommate. - Hi, I'm Jeff.
translation.es: -Mi compañera de cuarto. -Hola, yo soy Jeff.

translation.en: - Nice to meet you. - Hi. Welcome. I'm Alison.
Come on, let me show you my room.
You didn't tell them we were coming?
translation.es: ¿No les dijiste que íbamos a venir?

translation.en: - Who is she? - That's just some high- school work.
translation.es: -¿Quién es ella? -Los dibujé en el bachillerato.

translation.en: I haven't gotten around to taking it down yet.
Sara, I hope you're not a vegetarian.
translation.es: Sara, espero que no seas vegetariana.

translation.en: - Rebecca's an awesome roommate. - That's nice to hear.
translation.es: -Rebecca es una excelente compañera. -Me da gusto oírlo.

translation.en: I'm sure she likes you, because she's never brought anyone home before.
translation.es: Seguro tú le agradas porque nunca había traído a nadie a casa.

translation.en: You protect your daughter all her life and then she goes off to college.
translation.es: Proteges a tu hija toda su vida y luego se va a la universidad.

translation.en: And she's on her own. And you never know who she'll be exposed to.
translation.es: Y está sola, y nunca sabes a quién va a estar expuesta.

translation.en: Sara, we're going to make up a very nice room for you.
translation.es: Te vamos a preparar un cuarto lindo.

translation.en: Why are you up so late?
- So how you doing? - I'm fine.
Rebecca, look at me for a second.
- Your mother and I are very fond of you. - I know.
translation.es: Tu mamá y yo te queremos. Ya lo sé.

translation.en: All right, I'm gonna head on up to bed.
translation.es: Me voy a ir a la cama.

translation.en: Rebecca's gonna show me her high- school hangouts.
translation.es: Rebecca me va a enseñar lugares que frecuentaba.

translation.en: - Rebecca's doing really well. - She's doing good.
Well, you girls have a wonderful time.
It's nice to see where you come from.
translation.es: Me da gusto ver de dónde vienes.

translation.en: - This is the best. - Smells really good.
I used to come here, like, every day.
- It's Rebecca. - Well, just stay out here.
That's the girl from your drawings.
translation.es: Es la chica de tus dibujos.

translation.en: I wanted to introduce you to Sara.
Oh, good, Irene's back in town.
All right, I'll catch you later.
Don't wait up. I feel inspired.
translation.es: No me esperes. Me siento inspirada.

translation.en: - What are those? - That's what I gotta find out.
translation.es: -¿Qué son? -Es lo que tengo que averiguar.

translation.en: - All done. - You have a little something.
- What the hell? - I'm sorry, Rick.
Sweetheart, it's okay. No harm, no--
It says Zyprexa is used to treat the symptoms of psychotic conditions...
translation.es: Zyprexa se usa para tratar síntomas de condiciones sicóticas...

translation.en: I just thought she was weird.
translation.es: A mí solo me parecía rara.

translation.en: Maybe this is a refill. Maybe she's been taking them the whole time.
translation.es: Quizá sea de repuesto y las haya estado tomando.

translation.en: Yeah, I don't think she's ever taken them.
translation.es: Yo creo que nunca las ha tomado.

translation.en: I think it's time to move in with Irene.
translation.es: Creo que es hora de mudarme con Irene.

translation.en: You have great lips. What kind is that?
translation.es: Tienes unos labios preciosos. ¿Qué tipo de brillo es?

translation.en: A girl never knows how late she's gonna party.
translation.es: Una nunca sabe a qué hora va a acabar la fiesta.

translation.en: I would invite you back to my place, but I have a roommate.
translation.es: Te invitaría a donde vivo, pero tengo una compañera de cuarto.

translation.en: Well, as luck would have it, I'm only a few blocks away...
translation.es: Pues resulta que yo vivo a unas calles de aquí...

translation.en: It's Irene. Please leave a message.
translation.es: Habla Irene. Por favor deja un mensaje.

translation.en: - Where were you all night? - I was at the studio.
translation.es: -¿Dónde estuviste toda la noche? -En el estudio.

translation.en: I just lost track of time.
Please? I don't think I could do it without you.
translation.es: ¿Por favor? No lo puedo hacer sin ti.

translation.en: You can think of me as your sister.
You can call me Emily if you want.
translation.es: Me puedes llamar Emily si quieres.

translation.en: - That's all you're bringing? - I'll get the rest when Irene comes back.
translation.es: -¿Sólo vas a llevar esto? -Volveré cuando regrese Irene.

translation.en: - Where's your necklace? - I can't find it. It's okay.
translation.es: -¿Dónde está tu collar? -No lo encontré. Olvídalo.

translation.en: - Sara. - Stephen, I don't wanna go back there.
I'm gonna go look for it.
She just needs to move on. You know?
translation.es: Necesita pasar a lo que sigue. ¿Entiendes?

translation.en: If you find the necklace, just let me know. All right?
translation.es: Si encuentras su collar, avísame. ¿De acuerdo?

translation.en: Like the dean's office, or at least your R.A.
translation.es: A la oficina del rector o a alguien.

translation.en: And tell them what? She hasn't done anything to me.
translation.es: ¿Qué les digo? No me ha hecho nada.

translation.en: That girl's own parents are afraid of her.
translation.es: Sus propios papás le tienen miedo.

translation.en: - She sure scared the shit out of me. - Are these clean or dirty?
translation.es: -A mí me espantó bastante. -¿Esto está sucio o limpio?

translation.en: - Did you take this? - No. I don't think so.
That's enough. I'm returning this, and you gotta do something.
translation.es: Ya basta. Voy a devolver esto y tú necesitas hacer algo.

translation.en: No. I don't want you to go back there.
translation.es: No, no quiero que regreses ahí.

translation.en: Hey, it's Sara. Leave a message.
translation.es: Hola, habla Sara. Deja un mensaje.

translation.en: I'm actually in front of your dorm. I just flew in.
translation.es: Estoy enfrente de tu edificio. Llegué en avión.

translation.en: Look, I'm at the Rosewell Hotel, Room 210.
translation.es: Estoy en el hotel Rosewell, cuarto 210 .

translation.en: - I can walk you. - It's okay.
Well, the party starts at 10. I did hear that there is a great band playing.
translation.es: La fiesta empieza a las 10. Va a tocar un conjunto excelente.

translation.en: - I thought you said they suck. - They're getting better, you know?
- I hear the drummer's really hot. - He is.
translation.es: -Dicen que el baterista es sexy. -Y es cierto.

translation.en: But I'm sleeping with his girlfriend.
translation.es: Pero yo me acuesto con su novia.

translation.en: Hey, it's me. Irene needs me and she's not answering her phone.
translation.es: Hola, soy yo. Irene me necesita y no contesta el teléfono.

translation.en: And I'm really worried. Will you meet me there, please?
- What are you doing? - Sit down and shut up.
All I ever wanted was to be your friend.
translation.es: Lo único que yo quería era ser tu amiga.

translation.en: - Rebecca, I am your friend. - No, you're not.
translation.es: -Dios mío. Yo soy tu amiga. -No lo eres.

translation.en: - Yes, I am. - No. You're not!
We're here because you betrayed me.
Stop saying things you don't mean!
translation.es: ¡Deja de decir cosas que no sientes!

translation.en: I protected you against that whore Tracy...
translation.es: ¡Te protegí de la puta esa, Tracy...

translation.en: ...even that loser ex- boyfriend of yours!
translation.es: ¡Hasta de tu ex novio, el bueno para nada!

translation.en: - What did you do to him? - I got rid of them all for you!
translation.es: -¿Qué le hiciste? -¡Me deshice de todos, por ti!

translation.en: And how do you repay me? By leaving me!
I'm sorry. I am so sorry. From the bottom of my heart.
translation.es: Lo siento. Estoy muy arrepentida. Te lo digo de corazón.

translation.en: Now we can start all over again.
- What is that? - Just the two of us together.
- ...to have one best friend. - No! No! No!
- Rebecca! Rebecca, don't! - Lay still, bitch.
Stay away! Don't come any closer.
translation.es: ¡No te acerques! No te acerques más.

translation.en: - Sara! Sara! Sara, no! Sara! - Shit!
- The fire escape! - I just want to be your friend!
translation.es: -¡La escalera de afuera! -¡Sólo quiero ser tu amiga!

translation.en: - I can't leave you! - Go to the window.
- Sara! - I can't reach it! It's too far!
- Sara! - Oh, God. It's too far.
- Come on, come on, come on. - Get me up!
- Give me your hand. - Pull me in!
- ...I will shoot you, Rebecca. - You won't do it.
You know, you can move in with me if you want.
translation.es: Te puedes mudar conmigo, si quieres.

translation.en: I don't think I want a roommate for a while.
translation.es: No quiero compartir mi cuarto por un tiempo.

translation.en: But before you go, do you want to help me with a little something?
translation.es: Pero antes de irte, ¿me ayudas con un detalle?
